REPAIR

iPhone Repair

iPhone cracked glass, broken LCD screen, a display showing lines, not turning on or not holding a charge? Don’t worry, we can help. We offer most affordable and excellent repair services for iPhone. Our technicians are experts in their field and can quickly analyze any issue with your iPhone and fix them efficiently.

iPad repair

Do you have a broken screen, broken LCD, charging problems or your iPad won’t turn on, bring it to Apple Repair and get fixed up at the earliest by using the highest quality replacement parts. We will make sure that your Ipad will work like new and offer warranty on all of our repairs

MacBook Repair

Apple Repair is one of the best and most affordable Apple repair centers in Hamilton. With several years of experience in the IT field, we can offer professional services covering a wide range of Apple Mac repairs. We repair MacBook and MacBook Air from the first generation to the latest,

iMac Repair

Apple repair always focuses on delivering professional and most affordable repairs in Hamilton. With several years experience in the apple repairs products, we can successfully repair your iMac at a high-quality standard. Our skills technician are able to answer all your questions about your iMac.

High Quality

Apple Repair offers a Low Price Guarantee on all local competitors’ regular advertised pricing. That’s not all, we also guarantee to us high-quality, built-to-last components on your devices. Go ahead…ask us to show you the part(s) we are installing. Now, go ask the other guys who say they use high-quality parts and see if they are willing to let you inspect the parts.

Warranty

All parts and labour that we provide are covered by a six months warranty. If your repaired device seems to be having issues after a repair, please visit us right away for warranty diagnostics. We will be happy to diagnose and replace any defective parts that were used during the original repair. Please keep in mind that the warranty does NOT cover physical damage.

SERVICE

Apple products are a big investment and we believe they should last you years, thereby providing you with a great value over their lifetime.

As they cost three times as much, we believe that they should last three times as long. It’s for this reason that we’re committed to providing excellent care for your Apple devices.

We are one of the best and most affordable repair shops in Hamilton. With several years of experience in the IT field, we can offer professional services covering a wide range of Apple Mac repairs.

BRANCH

Apple Repair is a division of RepairTech. Since 2014, Repair Tech has striven at being unique in the IT industry, mainly in the Mobile phone and computer repairs. We started our business aiming to offer friendly, fast and reliable services in Waikato, both for small business and residential customers, always committed to keeping our quality of service high but our prices affordable. We are proud to have many of satisfied customers to endorse our reliability.
